trans-unit.source: Represents a <see langword="catch" /> exception block of a <see langword="try/catch" /> statement.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> can be used to represent a `catch` exception block of a `try/catch` statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> peut être utilisé pour représenter un `catch` bloc d’exception d’un `try/catch` instruction.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A> property specifies the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A> propriété spécifie le type d’exception à intercepter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A> property specifies a name for the variable representing the exception that has been caught.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A> propriété spécifie le nom de la variable qui représente l’exception qui a été interceptée.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A> collection property contains the statements for the `catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A> propriété de collection contient les instructions pour la `catch` bloc.

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates using <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> objects to define exception handling clauses of a try...catch block.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant illustre l’utilisation de <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause> objets pour définir les exceptions de traitement des clauses d’un bloc try... catch (bloc).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class.
The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
This is optional.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception.
The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
This is optional.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception and exception type.
The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
This is optional.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that represent the contents of the catch block.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> class using the specified local variable name for the exception, exception type and statement collection.
Gets or sets the type of the exception to handle with the catch block.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type of the exception to handle.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> qui indique le type d’exception à gérer.

trans-unit.source: If a value for this property is not specified, the value of this property defaults to <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Si une valeur pour cette propriété n’est pas spécifiée, la valeur de cette propriété par défaut <xref:System.Exception>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the variable name of the exception that the <see langword="catch" /> clause handles.
The name for the exception variable that the <see langword="catch" /> clause handles.
trans-unit.target: Le nom de la variable d’exception qui le <see langword="catch" /> clause handles.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the local variable for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété spécifie le nom de la variable locale de l’exception.

trans-unit.source: This local variable is optional.
By default, the clause does not have this variable.
trans-unit.target: Par défaut, la clause n’a pas cette variable.

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements within the catch block.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> containing the statements within the catch block.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> contenant les instructions dans un bloc catch.
